function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between well-being and lower healthcare costs and sickness benefit transfers","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the association may lead to incorrect policy decisions","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to validate the association and consulting experts in healthcare economics","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools","People":"Policy makers, healthcare economists","Owner":"Research institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Extrapolation of findings to the entire Danish population","Impact":"Overestimation or underestimation of the impact of flourishing on healthcare costs and benefit transfers","Mitigation":"Conducting sensitivity analysis, considering various scenarios, and consulting with statistical experts","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, statistical experts","Owner":"Research institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the confidence intervals of the estimated costs","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the potential cost savings associated with flourishing","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough sensitivity analysis, clarifying the sources of uncertainty, and providing transparent reporting of the confidence intervals","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software, sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, statistical experts","Owner":"Research institutions, government health departments"}]}
